verses.text: A Song of Degrees. They that trust in the Lord \add shall be\add* as Mount Zion: He that dwells in Jerusalem shall never be moved.
The mountains are round about her, And \add so\add* the Lord is round about his people, From henceforth and even forever.
For the Lord will not allow the rod of sinners To be upon the lot of the righteous; Lest the righteous should stretch forth Their hands to iniquity.
Do good, O Lord, to them \add that are\add* good, And to them \add that are\add* upright in heart.
But them that turn aside to crooked ways The Lord will lead away with the workers of iniquity: \add But\add* peace \add shall be\add* upon Israel.
